page.title: 09A Special Day Out
page.content: Not long ago I was on Holiday with my family in{Blackpool.}While I was there I went to see a show on the{North Pier with my Grandad and two sisters.We had good seats,seven rows from the front. The stars of the show were{Les Dennis and{Dustin Gee}.Unfortunately{Dustin} had stomach pains and so could not appear.Also in the show was{Vince Hill ,some dancers and some puppets.As{Les {Dennis}was on his own he had to pretend that he was{Vera Duckworth}as well as{Mavis Riley}from{Coronation {Street.Vince Hill}sang some old fashioned songs that I didn't like very much!I had only heard of one of his songs which was{'Hello'}by{Lionel {Ritchie.}The puppets came on next and at one time they were made to cry.I think they had a squirter inside them. It was a good show but{Les Dennis}was best.
